function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of awareness and connection to nature leading to unsustainable lifestyle.","Impact":"Continued environmental degradation and loss of natural resources.","Mitigation":"Promote education and experiences that foster a deeper connection to nature and sustainable living.","Technologies":"Nature-based education, experiential learning programs.","People":"General public, tourists, urban dwellers.","Owner":"Travel and tourism industry, education institutions."},{"Description":"Neglect of local cultures and traditions in the pursuit of tourism experiences.","Impact":"Disrespect for local communities, loss of cultural heritage.","Mitigation":"Prioritize collaboration and respectful interaction with local communities, promote cultural sensitivity and understanding.","Technologies":"Cultural exchange programs, community-based tourism initiatives.","People":"Tourists, tourism operators, local communities.","Owner":"Tourism industry, local community leaders."},{"Description":"Failure to engage tourists in conservation efforts and environmental awareness.","Impact":"Missed opportunity to leverage tourism as a force for conservation and sustainable practices.","Mitigation":"Implement conservation and sustainability education as part of tourist experiences, foster participation in local conservation projects.","Technologies":"Interactive conservation programs, sustainable tourism certifications.","People":"Tourists, conservation organizations, local communities.","Owner":"Tourism industry, conservation groups."}]}
